text: The new Neovim broke my Julia LSP. Anyone got it working?

elements.text: The new Neovim broke my Julia LSP. Anyone got it working?

text: I also couldn't get it working a few weeks ago when I tried it. I did notice that there are people working on it: <https://github.com/julia-vscode/LanguageServer.jl/issues/855>.

elements.text: I also couldn't get it working a few weeks ago when I tried it. I did notice that there are people working on it:

text: I'm curious why they removed the convenience. Now we have to do a manual setup. I only got the document lookup to work so far with nvim-lspconfig

elements.text: I'm curious why they removed the convenience. Now we have to do a manual setup. I only got the document lookup to work so far with nvim-lspconfig

text: <@ULGMQ3LCB> Do you have an update on this? I saw you participating in the issue above.

elements.text: Do you have an update on this? I saw you participating in the issue above.

text: I think it is resolved if you update neovim / nvim-lsp.

elements.text: I think it is resolved if you update neovim / nvim-lsp.

text: You'll need the latest neovim nightly, or at least one from a few days ago

elements.text: You'll need the latest neovim nightly, or at least one from a few days ago

text: Nice. I'll give it a try this weekend. Thanks.
